ygData.subject: Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: My guildmates and I spent a LOT of time in our mid-upper 20 s camping the Shadowmen.  Unless I recall incorrectly perhaps even it was low 20 s.  With a good
ygData.messageBody:
My guildmates and I spent a LOT of time in our mid-upper 20's camping the
Shadowmen. Unless I recall incorrectly perhaps even it was low 20's. With
a good harmony puller you'll find them a great way to get experience,
mediocre to okay loot; and quest items (I forget which class - wasn't
bards - but others in my Guild needed them).

A bad pull will pretty much guarantee death for one or more members of the
party - but there are reasonably close bind points to most of the SM camps.
The casters are tough; but I think you'll find that pulled properly you'll
end up netting a LOT of good experience..

Slyde of Xegony
Yes Gaelthorne - Level 35!
----- Original Message -----
From: "edwardscanni" <edwardscanni@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 12:33 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?


> From: "edwardscanni" <edwardscanni@...>
>
> Harmonic;
>
> I think I am missing something- I was helping some guild members with
their
> quest when i was lvl 33 or 34- we were fighting shadowmen in West
> Commons,and they all conned green to me. How would greenies kill a lvl 50?
I
> only fought them for a couple of hours and got no xp- didnt care because I
> was there for moral support :)- but I didnt realize they were that nasty?
> Was I just lucky? The rest of the group I was helping were mid 20's as I
> remember.
>
> Scanna Swiftsinger
> Lvl 36
> Bertoxx
